topics.body:
"@mariomarc":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdd9736368720bcfc60700#post_54bdd9736368720bcfc60700
Well you could always take a shower? I fined those to always give me a little wake me up?


"@SquiggyBomb":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdd9706368726bc9160700#post_54bdd9706368726bc9160700
YES! _*YES THEY FUCKING ARE!*_

Zone of the enders 1 Is good!

Though some people apparently didn't like it? Because the main character they said reminded them of Shinji.

But I honestly liked the main character, and the game, I played through ZOE 1 COUNTLESS of times.

Zone of the enders 2: 2nd runner was just, Just, *REMARKABLE*

I honestly love EVERYTHING about ZOE 2 and its way better then the first game by far, though I liked the first game I whole heartedly agree that the 1st game wasn't as good as the 2nd.

Its one of those rare few games where they made a sequel that was better then the first one.

ZOE 2 is the Bayo 2 of the ZOE series in my opinion, where you loved the first game, but then the second game came out and you came with it.


"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bdda046368727215430900#post_54bdda046368727215430900
Well holy shit! I'll give it a watch!

"@uc9":/dis/the-time-wasting-thread/post/54bddd20636872794bc50d00#post_54bddd20636872794bc50d00
I was talking to my brother about this.

He says he hates frozen because people always talk about it.

And I realized something.

Frozen kind of went the way of Shrek. What I like to call, Meme hell.

Where the movie got memed so hard till it killed it for some people.

And then for the short period people KEPT talking about it till everywhere you went "Frozen, Frozen, Frozen" Till you got sick of it. I like the movie and even I cant stand the movie in some cases.
